TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextCompositionManager extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

Docs.summary: Provides facilities for managing events related to input and text compositions.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool CompleteComposition (System.Windows.Input.TextComposition composition);
.method public static hidebysig bool CompleteComposition(class System.Windows.Input.TextComposition composition) cil managed

Docs.param: A object to complete.
Docs.summary: Completes a specified text composition.
Docs.returns: **true** if the text composition was successfully completed; otherwise, **false**.
Docs.exception: Raised when there is no input manager associated with *composition*, or when the text composition is already marked as completed.
